20101218023114.500|20101218023117.000|CCO|PROVIDED TO US BY WHISTLE-

20101218024336.444|20101218024337.556|CCO|       FOR TUBERCULOSIS.
20101218024337.556|20101218024338.667|CCO|  ASK YOUR DOCTOR IF YOU LIVE
20101218024338.667|20101218024339.778|CCO|    OR HAVE LIVED IN AN AREA
20101218024339.778|20101218024340.889|CCO|WHERE CERTAIN FUNGAL INFECTIONS
20101218024340.889|20101218024342.000|CCO|          ARE COMMON.
20101218024342.000|20101218024343.250|CCO| DON'T START Enbrel IF YOU HAVE
20101218024343.250|20101218024344.500|CCO|   AN INFECTION LIKE THE FLU.
